entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] Test run failing with `exiting due to exception: 613560632` from V8 #74303
  • [wasm][aot] Uncaught errors in `System.Runtime.Tests` #74302
  • F# compiler crashes with DOTNET_TieredPGO=1 #74295
    7.0.0
  • Exception of type 'Interop+AndroidCrypto+SslException' was thrown. #74292
  • Spmi-diff is showing diffs that are not related to the PR #74287
  • Huge performance drop for fsc.exe/dll #74286
    7.0.0

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] RhGetCodeTarget fails if executable code cannot be read #73906
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] PlatformNotSupportedException when creating an array #74299
  • .NET 7 Preview 7 - Polymorphic Deserialization Fails When Base Type Is Abstract #74294
  • Unable to call dll exported functions compiled in msys2 from C# PInvoke #74289
  • crash in JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int on Mono #74049
    8.0.0
  • crossgen2/VM layout mismatch in CI #73728
    7.0.0
  • On macOS, dotnet process seems to launch itself several times and maxes out CPU #66419
    Future
  • Regression in TimeZoneInfo for "Central Brazilian Standard Time" in .NET 6.0 #61842
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [Mono] Only enable Arm intrinsics for full aot mode #74301
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #74300
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • fix for SIP regions #74298
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74297
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update Xunit to 2.4.2 #74296
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #74293
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Avoid divide by zero in superpmi.py tpdiff #74291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix loading of R2R assemblies from byte arrays/streams #74290
  • Roll forward to the latest 6.0.x builds #74288
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Unwrap exception when calling entrypoint #74263
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Reenable test Runtime_34170 outside of Arm32 runs #74185
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Directory.CreateDirectory: create missing parents using default UnixFileMode. #74277
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable failing runtime extra platforms tests #74264
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Remove AES and SubtleCrypto from WASM #74246
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [WASM] Fix deadlock when instantiating pthread worker pool #74243
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add runs for release/7.0* on community architectures #74239
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable matching constants for vectors that needs upper half to be save/restore #74192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix for Random failures in System.Numerics.Tests.modpowTest.ModPowAxiom test #74181
    area-System.Numerics
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74205
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update Xunit to 2.4.2 #74262
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Add a way to suppress all trimming warnings #74220
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable JIT/Methodical/Coverage/copy_prop_byref_to_native_int on all configs #74265
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix one more Crossgen2 field layout mismatch with runtime #73978
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add guards around memcmp and memset to fix ubsan runtime errors. #74282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Unwrap exception when calling entrypoint #74235
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Disable Int128 use in by value ABI scenarios, and fix field layout behavior #74279
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Update arcade to 7.0.0-beta.22418.4 #74210
    area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't NativeAOT crossgen on ARM64 #74221
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Don't track current field of state machines #74216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Clean up EH routines #74270
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix loading of R2R assemblies from byte arrays/streams #74118
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/7.0-rc1] net7.0 + net6.0 workload multitargeting changes #74018
    blocking-release, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • update Helix arm64 images #73963
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix leak caused by not disposing the scoped parent service provider #74261
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 7.0.0
  • Remove ThreadPool native implementation #71719
    area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Omit the JS sync context if threads are not enabled #74236
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/7.0-rc1] [wasm] Add new javascript API types #74222
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Improve JitDisasm for top-level statements, expose DumpJittedMethods in Release #74090
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve performance of Tar library #74281
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • add guards around some calls to memset to silence ubsan #73953
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Add markdown readme for System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #72772
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fix gtGetClassHandle for static fields (R2R only) #74075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • Backport crossgen2 fix for musl-libc #73986
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet pack No Longer Correctly Parses Semicolon-Delimited Build Properties Starting in 6.0.301 #27319

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typos in Runtime Configuration Files doc #27317
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1956418 #27252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • added typo correction for `dotnet new` instantiate #27265
    area: dotnet new
  • dotnet new: switched telemetry to use `TelemetryEventEntry` #27223
    area: dotnet new

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: Partial-block only accessibility (private blockonly) #6393

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Implicit parameters #6300
  • String-based enums #2849

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clarification on Supported use of RegisterForPostInitialization #63501

Closed

  • VS suffix variable name with "Attribute" when renaming a variable #63499
  • Use keyword color for u8 suffix for UTF8 literals #63139
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Incremental Generators docs update #63500
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move Windows builds to new images #63498
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Filter out `RequiredMemberAttribute` from metadata symbols #63497
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #63496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Remove unused argument #63454
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Classify 'u8' in Utf8 string literals as keyword #63381
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63507
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63506
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63505
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63504
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #63503
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63502
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve cross-project add-using results #63449
    Area-IDE
  • Move symbol-cache incremental-analyzer out of oop. #63438
    Area-IDE
  • Produce binding errors for incomplete members #62874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix semantic model to handle ParenthesizedVariableDesignation #54439
    Area-Compilers
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator #63472
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support changing return types of methods #63486
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • Specify targets when loading MSBuildWorkspace #61391
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: json #43425
  • Uncatchable Exception While Using IFormFile Object Streams #43424
  • Allow endpoint filter attribute #43421
  • Debug is not working in ASPNET 7.0.100-preview7 when dotnet 6 is installed #43420

Closed

  • No service for type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.RoleManager registered NET 6 #43327
  • Canceled client result can result in connection being closed #43054
    7.0-rc1
  • [Discussion] [Breaking change]: Unit testing SignalR Hubs may need updating #42326
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: mvc #43385
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #43405

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1956492 #43428
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-rc1] HTTP/3 flaky test retries and logging #43423
    area-runtime
  • Retry a few tests #43422
    area-infrastructure
  • WebTransport interfaces require preview features #43419
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Hot reload: Acknowledge Blazor component parameter removal #43418
    area-blazor, feature-hot-reload

Merged

  • Require CancellationToken for client results (and fix cancel closing connection) #43249
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43412
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1

Updated

  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43413
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Strip Content-Length: 0 from responses that should not have a Content-Length #43417
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Make Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.Swagger experimental #43384
    area-grpc
  • Retry VariableMultipleStreamsInSequence test #43410
    area-infrastructure
  • Better support for HTTP/2 in SignalR .NET client #42817
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, blog-candidate

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Navigating to Page which is using DI with DataTemplate causes error #9565
  • Deployment Fails if Maui Class Library is referenced #9564
  • Unable to run brand new MAUI app on windows due to error regarding missing dependency that seems to be installed #9563
  • App.Close | App.Terminate | App.Restart #9562
  • Why FilePicker class cache the target file? #9561

Closed

  • Shell Tab broken with dependency injection #7895
  • File not found. JAVAC? #9454

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9560
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Tooltip Text support for Views #8864
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, .NET 7

Updated

  • Context menu support for Windows and MacCatalyst #9174
    area/desktop 🖥️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support stored procedure mappings that are agnostic of inheritance mapping strategy #28806
  • Stored procs with TPH doesn't work with multiple subtypes #28805
  • Exception: "An item with the same key has already been added" in stored proc validation #28804
  • Exception: "Unable to cast object of type" in many stored procs mapping cases #28803

PullRequests

Created

  • Add scaffolding DatabaseTrigger class #28801
